```{r}
library(shiny)

# create a user interface
ui <- fluidPage(
  "Hello, World!!"
)

# define a custom function to create the server
server <- function(input, output, session) {

}

# Run the app
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)


# Ask a question with an input
ui <- fluidPage(textInput("name", "Enter a name:"), textOutput("q"))

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$q <- renderText({
    paste(
      "Do you prefer tea or coffee,", input$name, "?"
    )
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)

# Another one
ui <- fluidPage(
  textInput("name", "What is your name?"),
  textOutput("greeting")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  output$greeting <- renderText({
    paste("Hi,", input$name)
  })
}

shinyApp(ui, server)


# Building a babynames explorer
library(babynames)
library(tidyverse)
head(babynames)

# create the ui
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Baby Name Explorer"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      textInput("name", "Enter Name")
    ), 
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("trend")
    )
  )
)

# Server
server <- function(input, output, session){
  output$trend <- renderPlot({
    data_name <- subset(babynames, name == input$name)
    ggplot(data_name)+
      geom_line(
        aes(
          x = year, 
          y = prop,
          color = sex
        )
      )+
      labs(
        title = "Popularity of a name over time",
        y = "proportion",
        caption = "Made by George Ngugi",
        subtitle = "Analysis of full baby name data provided by the SSA"
      )+
      ggthemes::theme_economist()
  })
}

# run the app
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
